channel.title: Disney – Jewelry by Jonathan Silva
channel.description: Portfolio of CAD/CAM Designer Jonathan Silva

item.title: Stitch Playing Guitar
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Stitch Playing Guitar

Rocklove X Disney

One of a collection of Lilo & Stitch officially licensed jewelry I did. Designed by Rocklove in collaboration with Disney. I happen to be a guitarist myself, so this one was easily a favorite of mine.

Software: Zbrush
Client: Disney, Rocklove

item.title: The Princes & The Frog Ring
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
The Princes & The Frog Ring

Rocklove X Disney

This is part of a collection of officially licensed Disney merch designed by Rocklove Jewelry. We did several pieces in conjunction with the live action movie release, but this one is my favorite.

Software: Zbrush, Rhinoceros 3D, Matrix

Client: Disney, Rocklove
